summary: RMS Queen Mary 2 is a British ocean liner and Cunard Line's flagship since 2004. It's the largest ocean liner ever built and sails between Southampton and New York. Designed by British architects and built in France, it was the longest and largest passenger ship when launched. It has a top speed of over 30 knots and uses integrated electric propulsion. Onboard, there are 15 restaurants, 5 pools, a casino, and a planetarium.
title: Queen Mary 2
